Author: LanayruPromenade
Text: I'm in the same boat. I'm trying to find ways of eating a normal amount without trying to purge. I found going for a walk or chewing some gum (or smoking a cigarette) settles the  food in my stomach. Also, I'm trying to stay away from food that's easy to purge (carbs mainly).   &#x200B;  Hope you pull through it.
